tag_list: thumb-arcade, asendu, unmarket, mobile, games, apps
overview:
Andy Rosic is Player 01, aka CEO, of Thumb Arcade. He’s the technically savvy, better looking half of the dynamic duo that founded the company.

With twelve years of mobile product development under his belt, Andy has seen and done a lot of things. From back when two-way pagers seemed like the coolest technology to trump a Zip drive through to today, he’s been dreaming up, building and shipping consumer apps and business apps - before even the term “app” was invented. His product creations have led to public company mergers and buyouts, as well as propelled small dreamy startups into real existence.

Andy is currently running his third successful startup, Thumb Arcade, and enjoying every minute of it. His kids think he’s a rock star - not because he does session work on electric guitar, but because he makes games.
